Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding Mariah Carey's project 'All That Glitters'?
Options:
A. a) Mariah Carey released an album titled 'Rainbow' in 1999.
B. b) 'All That Glitters' was initially a working title for a project by Carey.
C. c) 'All That Glitters' included material from the album 'Rainbow'.
D. d) Carey started working on 'All That Glitters' in late 1998.
Answer: a) Mariah Carey released an album titled 'Rainbow' in 1999., b) 'All That Glitters' was initially a working title for a project by Carey., c) 'All That Glitters' included material from the album 'Rainbow'.

A. a) 'Rainbow' was an album released by Carey that included material for 'All That Glitters'.
B. b) 'All That Glitters' was produced with the support of Virgin Records.
C. c) 'All That Glitters' is about a club dancer who becomes a successful singer.
D. d) All of the above
